content.raw:
Hi, @jiapei100.

The errors come described a few lines above the line which says "Please see the BUILD ERRORS above". Please run `cmake ..` again and look for errors described under "BUILD ERRORS":

~~~
-- BUILD WARNINGS
-- 	# warnings go here
-- END BUILD WARNINGS

-- BUILD ERRORS: These must be resolved before compiling.
-- 	# errors go here
-- END BUILD ERRORS

CMake Error at CMakeLists.txt:289 (message):
  Errors encountered in build.  Please see the BUILD ERRORS above.
~~~
content.html:
Hi, @jiapei100.

The errors come described a few lines above the line which says "Please see the BUILD ERRORS above". Please run cmake .. again and look for errors described under "BUILD ERRORS":

-- BUILD WARNINGS

-- END BUILD WARNINGS
